FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: “Lord Bolas has shown me how each miserable little life holds untold resources.”
« Le Seigneur Bolas m’a montré comment chaque petite vie misérable pouvait renfermer des ressources considérables. »
“Mi Señor Nicol Bolas me ha mostrado que cada pequeña y miserable vida tiene sus recursos ocultos.”
„Fürst Bolas hat mir gezeigt, welch wertvolle Rohstoffe noch im kleinsten Lebewesen stecken.“
“Lord Bolas mi ha mostrato come ogni piccola vita miserabile contiene risorse inaudite.”
「ボーラス卿は私に、哀れな小さき生命がどれほどの勝ちを秘めているかを教えてくれました」
“볼라스님께서는 하찮은 생명 하나에 얼마나 무궁무진한 잠재적 자원이 있는지를 나에게 가르쳐주셨다.”
«Повелитель Болас показал мне, что в каждой никчемной и жалкой жизни есть скрытые возможности».
“O Senhor Bolas me mostrou como cada vida miserável encerra incríveis recursos.”

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED, EffectController() ) filter:SetCardInstance( Object() ) filter:AddExtra( FILTER_EXTRA_FLIP_CARD_INSTANCE )
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) local player = EffectController() if target ~= nil then local amount = target:GetCurrentPower() target:Sacrifice(player) PlayerDrawCards( player, amount ) player:GainLife(amount) end
